title: scCausalVI disentangles single-cell perturbation responses with causality-aware generative model
details: S An, JW Cho, K Cao, J Xiong, M Hemberg, L Wan - bioRxiv, 2025
abstract: Single-cell RNA sequencing provides detailed insights into cellular heterogeneity and responses to external stimuli. However, distinguishing inherent cellular variation from extrinsic effects induced by external stimuli remains a major analytical …
